title: Calories in One Oreo
meta_description: Discover calories in one oreo, including carbs, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per cookie for easy tracking.
assumptions: Standard Oreo cookie (chocolate sandwich with creme filling, ~11 g); no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, size, and any added toppings; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One standard Oreo cookie contains about 53 kcal and 7.3 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Oreo?
faqs.a: Approximately 53 kcal per standard Oreo cookie.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one Oreo?
faqs.a: About 7.3 g total carbs, including 0.4 g fiber and 3.9 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does one Oreo have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 0.5 g protein and 2.5 g total fat (0.7 g saturated).
One Oreo has 38 mg sodium, which is moderate for a small treat.

faqs.q: How do calories compare in Oreo varieties?
faqs.a: Standard is 53 kcal; Double Stuf adds ~20 kcal, Thins subtract ~13 kcal.
